info.author: Felipe Curty
info.name: pytest-pyspec
info.summary: A plugin that transforms the pytest output into a result similar to the RSpec. It enables the use of docstrings to display results and also enables the use of the prefixes "describe", "with" and "it".

info.author: Felipe Curty
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.name: pytest-pyspec
info.summary: A python test spec based on pytest
